instruction: Please create an SSH user named "charles" with password "Ex@mpleP@55w0rd!" on Ubuntu who is only allowed to access the folder "test1".

result.command: [[ $(getent passwd charles) && $(getent passwd charles | cut -d: -f6) = "/test1" ]] && echo "User charles exists and has /test1 as their home directory" || echo "User charles does not exist or doesn't have /test1 as their home directory"

rules.expected: User charles exists and has /test1 as their home directory
